lcInstruction.p:
The DITA Learning and Training specialization defines five topic types contain course planning, organization, and content information. They are:
learningPlan—Provides a framework for planning learning content
learningOverview—
learningContent—contains the actual learning content.
learningSummary—contains review materials.
learningAssessment—contains exercises, quizzes, or tests

These topic types describe a wide range of information, from planning to content to assessment. Not everyone will use all of these topic types. Partly it depends on how rigorous your course development is.
The following sections describe these topic types in greater detail.
